sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT MAX(booking_date) as latest_cdc FROM dbo.factbookings
SELECT * FROM dbo.factbookings WHERE booking_date > '@{activity('last_cdc').output.firstRow.cdc}' AND booking_date <= '@{activity('MaxDateinfact').output.firstRow.latest_cdc}'

scriptLines: RawMinutes derive(raw_mins = iif(raw_mins < 0, raw_mins + 1440, raw_mins)) ~> AdjustOvernight
